page.title: 07THE LOCAL LANDSCAPE
page.content: The land is quite hilly, but much of it has been levelled and roads have been built. There is a housing estate in Willesborough, and a road which leads to Sevington, has just recently been finished. From the motorway a road leads to Â£The Street' carrying on to the William Harvey Hospital. In The Street the houses are Tudor or and Georgian style. Hythe road is very busy during the morning when people make their way to work and school.It is now easier to take the motorway to avoid the congestion of Ashford.The motorway leads to and from Folkestone, London, and into Ashford.Along the side of the motorway there are grassy verges which are bordered by wooden fences.
